title: Brave
description: Block ads. Save data. And get way faster webpages. Just by switching your browser.

title: Bitwarden
description: Bitwarden is an open-source password manager that securely stores and syncs your passwords and sensitive data across devices.

title: 2FAS
description: The Internets favorite open-source two-factor authenticator

title: NextDNS
description: NextDNS is a privacy-focused DNS service that blocks ads, trackers, and malicious domains while giving users detailed analytics and custom filtering options.

title: Signal
description: Signal is a secure messaging app that uses end-to-end encryption to protect texts, calls, and media, ensuring only you and your intended recipient can read or hear them.

title: Proton Mail
description: Proton Mail is an encrypted email service that prioritizes privacy by ensuring only you and your recipients can read your messages, with no access for the provider.

title: EasyOptOuts
description: EasyOptOuts is a service that helps users quickly find and access opt-out pages for major data brokers and marketing lists to remove their personal information from online databases.

title: Proton VPN
description: Offers short, 5-minute meditations for busy individuals, with sessions led by mindfulness experts.
